thread.title: TJ Jay
thread.title_full: Right Channel Radios reviewed by TJ Jay

author: TJ Jay
title: TJ Jay
text: I was looking for a radio for my TJ long behold right channel radios popped up. Just what I needed a simple kit with all parts and information on installation included. When I finally ordered it I got great products (SWR 1.3 all channels with taillight mount) and customer services responded to all issues well above and beyond my expectations to make me want to come back for my SSB radio!!
